title: Chet Hockman, Mtn. View, dies of gunshot wound
content:
In a press release to the Quill, Perkins said Mtn. View officers were contacted at 3 p.m. Saturday, Dec. 10, by a male from 210 W. Second St. who said he had just shot his friend, Chet Hockman.
Officers responded to the scene where they found Hockman with a 12-gauge injury to the chest and rendered first aid, Perkins said.
“Unfortunately Chet succumbed to his injuries at the scene,” the police chief said in the release. “The suspect was held at the police station and a witness was interviewed as well in regards to the matter.”
